author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/mod_dav_svn/update.c
(add_helper): A Philip Martin-recommended, Mike Pilato-approved,
little piece of commentary about (ultimately) printf() safety.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_repos/delta.c
(svn_repos_dir_delta): Revert revision 6242.  A bug in the 0.24
client means that, for compatibility's sake, this crutch needs to
stay in place until the 0.26 tarball.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix another URI-encoding bug.  This patch was the joint mental and
physical effort of Ben Collins-Sussman and C. Michael Pilato.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/update.c
(add_helper): Fix the calculation of the baseline collection URL to
do URI-encoding.  Also, don't pass 'elt' to send_xml() as the
format string since it might contain sequences that look like
string insert placeholders.  For example, "this%20dir" might look
like "this[insert an integer of width 20 here]ir".
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/update_tests.py
(test_list): Add reference to Ben's new regression test for this bug.

author: sussman
msg: * update_tests.py (new_dir_with_spaces): regression test for upcoming bugfix

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix some seriously nasty pool usage in the path-based editor driver.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/path_driver.c
(dir_stack_t): New.
(open_dir): Instead of storing dir batons in the stack, we now store
the dir_stack_t items (which hold a dir baton and subpool in which
that baton was created!)
(pop_stack): Pop the stack, and destroy the subpool associated with it.
(svn_delta_path_driver): Do more of the same stuff in here.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(do_item_commit): Ensure that the tempfile paths live in the same
pool as the hash which will house them.
